filesToModify.title: List of files that contain versions which are to be bumped

rootPath.title: Relative or absolute path to project root
rootPath.description: This path will be used to calculate paths to configured files if they are configured as relative paths. If the root path is configured as relative path, it is calculated based on the config file path.

versionRangeIndicators.title: List of indicators to automatically determine version range

fileToModify.title: A file that contains versions which are to be bumped

path.title: Relative or absolute path to the file
path.description: Relative paths are calculated from the configured (or calculated) project root.

patterns.title: List of version patterns to be searched and replaced in the configured file
patterns.description: Each pattern must contain a `{%version%}` placeholder that is replaced by the new version. Patterns are internally converted to regular expressions, so feel free to use regex syntax such as `\s+`.

reportUnmatched.title: Show warning if a configured pattern does not match file contents

reportMissing.title: Fail if file to modify does not exist

packageName.title: NPM package name as defined in package.json

documentation.title: Define whether extension has a ReST documentation

presetShort.title: Short preset configuration
presetShort.description: Configuration for presets which do not have required preset options

releaseOptions.title: Set of release options to respect with the --release command option

commitMessage.title: Commit message pattern to use for new releases
commitMessage.description: May contain a `{%version%}` placeholder that is replaced by the version to release.

overwriteExistingTag.title: Define whether existing tags should be overwritten
overwriteExistingTag.description: If set to `true`, the existing tag will be deleted before the new tag is created.

signTag.title: Define whether to sign new tags
signTag.description: Uses Git's `-s` command option to sign the new tag using the Git-configured signing key.

tagName.title: Tag name pattern to use for new releases
tagName.description: Must contain a `{%version%}` placeholder that is replaced by the version to release.

versionRangeIndicator.title: Indicator to use a specific version range for the new version to bump

patterns.title: List of version range patterns to match for this indicator

versionRangePattern.title: Pattern to indicate a specific version range

pattern.title: Regular expression to match a specific version range indicator

type.title: Type of the pattern to match
